title: Lassie and the Wild Mountain Trail
description: Young Paul Carter has only just gotten home from boarding school when he finds out that an old family friend has suffered an injury that makes him think men are after him to put him in prison for a crime he didn't commit. Now it's up to Paul and Lassie to find Hardrock who's hiding in an old mineshaft up in the mountains - before someone gets hurt.
author: I.G. Edmonds
